headline: Northern Trust (NasdaqGS:NTRS) Secures Global Custody Agreement with Dutch Pension Fund
summary: Northern Trust (NasdaqGS:NTRS) experienced a 9% share price increase over the past month. This rise coincided with the appointment by BPF Beton, which selected Northern Trust to provide key financial services. Additionally, the company expanded its network through a partnership with Partners Group and participation in Project Ensemble, focusing on digital carbon credits. These events likely supported the broader upward market trends as the S&P 500 and Nasdaq enjoyed strong performances...

headline: Northern Trust Appoints Katherine McCabe to Lead OCIO Strategy for Asset Servicing
summary: CHICAGO, June 02, 2025--In a newly created role, McCabe will be responsible for developing strategic relationships with OCIO firms and associated investment consultants.

raw.headline: Northern Trust Appoints Katherine McCabe to Lead OCIO Strategy for Asset Servicing

headline: Northern Trust Appointed Custodian for Dutch Pension Fund BPF Beton
summary: AMSTERDAM, June 02, 2025--Northern Trust (Nasdaq: NTRS) announced today that it has been appointed by Dutch pension fund BPF Beton to provide global custody, regulatory reporting, valuation and accounting, and performance analytics.
